text: The men's 110 metres hurdles event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 16, 17 and 18 July. 106.7 cm (3'6) (senior implement) hurdles were used. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Aries Merritt ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Dayron Robles ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Kevin Craddock ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 18 July Wind: -0.6 m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !! Notes |- | || align=left | Aries Merritt || align=left | || 13.56 || |- | || align=left | Dayron Robles || align=left | || 13.77 || |- | || align=left | Kevin Craddock || align=left | || 13.77 || |- | 4 || align=left | Liu Lilu || align=left | || 13.96 || |- | 5 || align=left | Rodrigo Pereira || align=left | || 14.10 || |- | 6 || align=left | Éder de Souza || align=left | || 14.13 || |- | 7 || align=left | Garfield Darien || align=left | || 14.20 || |- | 8 || align=left | Jens Werrmann || align=left | || 14.29 || |} ===Semifinals=== 17 July ====Semifinal 1==== Wind: -0.3 m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
